mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT T3.MODULE_ID,T3.LEVEL_NUM,T3.PARENT_ID,T4.MODULE_NAME,T4.MODULE_URL,T4.GLYPH,T4.ICON_CLS,T4.CLICK_EVENT,T4.COMPONENT ,T4.IS_QUICK_MENU FROM cd_r_employee_role T0 INNER JOIN cd_o_role T1 ON T0.ROLE_ID = T1.ROW_ID AND T1.DELETED_FLAG = '0' AND T1.STATUS = '1' INNER JOIN cd_r_limit T2 ON T1.ROW_ID = T2.ROLE_ID AND T2.DELETED_FLAG = '0' AND T2.STATUS = '1' INNER JOIN cd_r_menus T3 ON T3.TEMPLATE_ID = T1.TEMPLATE_ID AND T3.DELETED_FLAG = '0' AND T3.STATUS = '1' AND T2.OBJ_ID = T3.MODULE_ID AND T2.OBJ_TYPE = 'URL' INNER JOIN cd_o_module T4 ON T3.MODULE_ID = T4.ROW_ID AND T4.DELETED_FLAG = '0' AND T4.STATUS = '1' WHERE T0.EMPLOYEE_ID = #{employeeId} AND T0.DELETED_FLAG = '0' AND T0.STATUS = '1' AND T1.FARM_ID = #{farmId}

SELECT DISTINCT T1.MODULE_ID,T1.LEVEL_NUM,T1.PARENT_ID,T2.MODULE_NAME,T2.MODULE_URL,T2.GLYPH,T2.ICON_CLS,T2.CLICK_EVENT,T2.COMPONENT ,T2.IS_QUICK_MENU FROM cd_r_menus T1 INNER JOIN cd_o_module T2 ON T1.MODULE_ID = T2.ROW_ID AND T2.DELETED_FLAG = '0' AND T2.STATUS = '1' WHERE T1.DELETED_FLAG = '0' AND T1.STATUS = '1' AND T1.TEMPLATE_ID= #{templateId}
